comment.author: 28909279@N00
comment._content: My brother and I worked behind the soda counter for many summers.  It's most unfortunate that it's now a shlocky jewelry store.

comment.author: 59625741@N08
comment._content: Wow! It's really great! I admire old photos. It's sad that it is not a pharmacy anymore. But nowadays, I prefer buying in a 24 hour online pharmacy because it's very convenient. I'm thankful I saw this photo.
